医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
远程口译引起人们对医疗保健领域沟通质量的担忧由于医疗保健行业在 COVID-19 大流行期间严重依赖技术，口译员报告了不同的经历，这引发了人们对远程通信平台在关键医疗环境中的有效性的严重质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Remote-interpreting-raises-concerns-about-communication-quality-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Remote-interpreting-raises-concerns-about-communication-quality-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2159150c-2c6b-4a4d-ac52-746c118ade54 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 11:13:20 -0500 Remote interpreting raises concerns about communication quality in healthcare
研究人员开发出第一种基于聚合物的亨廷顿病疗法基于聚合物的突破性疗法有望通过预防有毒蛋白质团块和增强神经元存活来逆转亨廷顿病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Researchers-develop-the-first-polymer-based-therapeutic-for-Huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Researchers-develop-the-first-polymer-based-therapeutic-for-Huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=773f330f-a82a-435a-b9ab-6e4e73005911 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 09:25:00 -0500 Researchers develop the first polymer-based therapeutic for Huntington’s disease
年轻时诊断出 2 型糖尿病的人死亡风险更高研究结果表明，年轻发病的 2 型糖尿病与较高的死亡率和并发症相关，这凸显了采取有针对性的医疗保健策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Mortality-risk-higher-for-those-diagnosed-with-type-2-diabetes-at-younger-ages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Mortality-risk-higher-for-those-diagnosed-with-type-2-diabetes-at-younger-ages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdece1b7-e94d-4e15-b6ed-5519c81fb2df Mon, 04 Nov 2024 08:49:00 -0500 Mortality risk higher for those diagnosed with type 2 diabetes at younger ages
太空生长的干细胞有望加速生物疗法梅奥诊所的两名研究人员表示，在国际空间站（ISS）微重力下生长的干细胞具有独特的品质，有朝一日可以帮助加速新的生物疗法并治愈复杂的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Space-grown-stem-cells-show-promise-for-acceleating-biotherapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Space-grown-stem-cells-show-promise-for-acceleating-biotherapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0302c047-fe3d-4de6-b362-fb70b431ab4b Mon, 04 Nov 2024 08:15:06 -0500 Space-grown stem cells show promise for accelerating biotherapies
获得拨款建造便携式 PET 扫描仪用于早期阿尔茨海默病检测威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家老龄化研究所获得了为期五年的 620 万美元拨款，用于建造便携式高分辨率正电子发射断层扫描 (PET) 扫描仪，该扫描仪可以检测老年痴呆症的早期阶段。阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Grant-awarded-to-build-a-portable-PET-scanner-for-early-Alzheimers-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Grant-awarded-to-build-a-portable-PET-scanner-for-early-Alzheimers-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7815bb3-dd5d-46a2-a02e-ca9fc4e0e6a9 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:59:25 -0500 Grant awarded to build a portable PET scanner for early Alzheimer's detection
生酮饮食可能更有利于经期健康生酮饮食有望影响月经生理，在绝经前肥胖女性中观察到月经周期频率和强度增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Ketogenic-diets-could-be-better-for-menstrual-health-period.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Ketogenic-diets-could-be-better-for-menstrual-health-period.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70b120db-c3c6-4607-bf73-cbe012ee4c3d Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:59:00 -0500 Ketogenic diets could be better for menstrual health, period
运动可暂时改善与 2 型糖尿病遗传风险相关的肌肉胰岛素抵抗该研究揭示了剧烈运动如何减轻 TBC1D4 变异携带者的胰岛素抵抗，强调了个性化糖尿病干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Exercise-temporarily-improves-muscle-insulin-resistance-linked-to-genic-risk-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Exercise-temporarily-improves-muscle-insulin-resistance-linked-to-genic-risk-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65e47bdd-f986-4661-97e7-9b3331c81dd2 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:47:00 -0500 Exercise temporarily improves muscle insulin resistance linked to genetic risk for type 2 diabetes
无创脑刺激有望增强认知障碍患者的导航技能一项关于深部脑刺激的研究揭示了其对空间导航的影响，强调了衰老认知缺陷的潜在治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Nonpressive-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-enhancing-navigation-skills-in-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Nonpressive-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-enhancing-navigation-skills-in-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b1b4924-e1b4-47de-b01c-1d98a0bd1921 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:29:00 -0500 Noninvasive brain stimulation shows promise for enhancing navigation skills in cognitive impairment
旨在改善睡眠和心理健康的医生新加班限制医生是医疗保健领域的重要组成部分，他们与其他医疗专业人员一起确保及时诊断、治疗和管理复杂的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-overtime-limits-for-physicians-aimed-at-improving-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-overtime-limits-for-physicians-aimed-at-improving-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b805b483-3778-424d-9355-e71ea9380cc9 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:18:45 -0500 New overtime limits for physicians aimed at improving sleep and mental health
减肥药索马鲁肽可缓解膝关节炎疼痛索马鲁肽显示出通过减轻疼痛和减轻体重来治疗膝骨关节炎的前景，为传统药物干预提供了安全的替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Weight-loss-drug-semaglutide-may-offer-relief-for-knee-arthritis-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Weight-loss-drug-semaglutide-may-offer-relief-for-knee-arthritis-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21c5c1b8-4b99-4cec-9812-b665a10f89c7 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:00:00 -0500 Weight loss drug semaglutide may offer relief for knee arthritis pain
